content: just in time for easter i release this small rabbit pattern crocheted with both tunisian and regular crochet this tiny friend only requires 8 grams of scheepjes catona yarn and a small amount of filling to make the bunny measures 8 x 11 cm including ears arms and legs the square body measures 5 5 x 6 5 cm ❀ ❀ ❀ **stitches used in this pattern ** chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble and tunisian simple stitch us terms ❀ ❀ ❀ **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters welcome https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/ ❀ ❀ ❀ this pattern have been fully tested thank you sandra lindahl for your great work and feedback with this pattern ❀ ❀ ❀
